description: For more than 30 years, Valmont has been deploying all of its know-how in the field of anti-aging with professional care combining expertise, product performance and accuracy of gestures. Valmont Spa at the Hazelton offers world-class facial treatments, luxurious body treatments and specialized massages designed to release stress and toxins. Providing pampered attention from our experts, you will leave the Spa at the Hazelton feeling better than ever.

reviews.title: Abysmal
text: We came for our wedding anniversary and no one even mentioned it when we arrived (15 min early).

Malena's massage was the oddest I've ever had. She seemed to press all the wrong spots, like pain spots instead of muscles. And when I asked her to increase the pressure in certain areas, it still wasn't enough. I told her I had hypermobility but she still let my arm hyperextend and pulled my leg way too far to the side so it hurt, and pulled something in my neck when she did the same with my arm.

I went to open my locker and it would not open, I had to get the staff to open it which took a long time as their machine didn't seem to be working. I went to have a steam while I waited but the area smelled like urine.

I went to shower and it was all cold. I figured out the warm but only one tap would run warm, the rain shower from ahead would only run cold, and changed the main tap to cold whenever it was turned on.

The shampoo and conditioner didn't clean or hydrate my hair, maybe they replaced L'occitane with some cheap brand, or accidentally used lotion, I don't know. My hair came out still oily and yet also dry and frizzy.
They don't have any herbal or green tea, only black tea.
No real apologies were made about the locker or the smelly steam room ( which I mentioned) and the lady didn't even ask how everything went, when we were paying at the end.
Pretty dismal and disappointing anniversary experience. We've been to all the spas around town, this was the worst.

reviews.title: Spa Day
text: This was my second trip to the Spa at the Hazelton. I had a wonderful message by Anita. I enjoyed a great facial as well.  I really enjoyed the eucalyptus sauna. It was so relaxing. Ms. Khryzz operating the Spa desk was very attentive and kind. I will be back.

reviews.title: Restful
text: The service was professional and totally relaxing.  The ambience was designed to enhance the experience.

reviews.title: Great Spa Experience!
text: I booked a spa service for my birthday today!  From the moment I walked into the hotel I was greeted by staff who led me to the elevators for the spa. (BTW they have a signature scent! The hotel smelled amazing, I bought the oil lol)
The  spa reception staff was very welcoming and kind.
Since it was my first time. They showed me where everything was.
I used the steam shower and pool.
Everything was clean and I saw staff come into the change room multiple times making sure things are in order and clean.
I got a body scrub. The service was amazing. Made me feel comfortable and relaxed. Can’t wait again till the spring to get another one!

reviews.title: My First Time Experiencing the Hazelton’s Spa
text: First things first, the customer service was immaculate from the moment my partner and I arrived. The day before I received a call from the Spa Agent, Khyrzz, advising me to arrive 30 minutes early in addition to pointers on what to wear.

Both my partner and I were provided individual tours of the spa and as we waited for one another. The lovely staff that initially contacted me prior to, made sure to insure that we waited for one another comfortably with a bottle of alkaline water as per personal preference.
The amenities were amazing down to every detail and the state of cleanliness may lead you to believe you are the spa’s first client ever.

We received the Hazelton Signature Scrub body treatment and Stress Relief massage. Both were rejuvenating and relaxing in their own unique way. The scrub provided a feeling of incomparable cleanliness after taking a shower in the beautifully designed shower. Where as the massage allowed my mind and body to go on an unexpected vacation that not even changing positions could bring me back to reality. The moment the massage stopped is when I realized I was still in Toronto.
Thank you for such an amazing experience! Your hospitality and overall services represent an experience of a life time.

reviews.title: It was decadent
text: I came with my husband for couples massage, wow. They have a couple of rooms in one of the hotel rooms and are set up so beautifully. Our massages were excellent. The moment we arrive at the spa we were great so warmly welcomed. Maria and Kayla? I believe were so nice and attentive. They offer us tea or coffee. The pool is so nice and quiet, we felt we were the only ones there. We will definitely coming back. Thank you all the staff!! Beautiful hotel and Spa.

reviews.title: The Spa at the Hazelton .........Spruce up your Complexion.
text: The Hazelton Hotel dwells in one of Toronto's most stylish social districts, often associated  with beauty and well grooming (Yorkville). The Hotel has dramatic and cutting-edge interiors with superb accommodations and exceptional dining venues. What is most remarkable about the Hazleton; however, is its Spa.

The Spa at the Hazelton by Valmont is a luxurious oasis to indulge in body beautification and skin maintenance. Valmont's anti-aging product line is always innovating with advancements in skin care technology.......simply said, Valmont crafts amazing skincare products and associated facials.............a feat that the most avid spa-goers relish. In addition, the spa deploys it wealth of know-how to provide luxurious body treatments and specialized massages designed to release stress and toxins.

The wellness sanctuary embracing the spa includes 5 treatment rooms (men, women, couples), change rooms, and lounge areas. Guests have access to an excellent fitness centre, steam room and a drop-dead gorgeous saltwater lap pool.
There are limitless options when it comes to stress-relieving, detoxing or just chilling out. I love a good stone massage, so that it what I opted for....this pampering made me feel better than ever.

So, if you would like to roll back the years with an intensive facial, or recover baby-soft skin with a signature exfoliating scrub  or just escape the busyness of the city............then try the ...........Spa at the Hazelton.......Spruce up your Complexion.

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
text: The spa is absolutely stunning! My husband and I stayed at the hotel for our 25th wedding anniversary, and we decided to treat ourselves to some massages as well! We both got deep tissue massages, and they were absolutely fantastic. The staff were all incredible and made us feel very pampered, safe, and comfortable! Although we did not get a chance to use the facilities, we were given a tour of the spa and we will most definitely be back to try out the salt water pool and the eucalyptus infused steam rooms! The smell was heavenly!
Than you Hazelton Spa for making this anniversary so special and memorable!

reviews.title: Amazing Deep Tissue Massage!
text: I recently received a deep tissue massage at The Hazelton Hotel spa and would highly recommend it!  I felt properly pampered from the moment I walked in.  Social distancing protocols made me feel safe.  The masseuse was very professional and made me feel relaxed and helped with the tension in my back.  Afterwards, I walked out of the room and they served me an elixir and warm cloth for my hands.  I also received a giftbag with bath salts, a nice added touch!  They truly know how to go above and beyond!

reviews.title: Relaxing Massage
text: Wonderful  experience, friendly staff.  Treated myself to a massage.   Pandemic  protocols were in place  so not all amenities can  be  used  but hopefully soon.

reviews.title: Best Deep-Tissue Massage Ever!
text: For the past few months I've been suffering with severe knots in my back. I kept ignoring it until I realized that it was getting in the way of my day-to-day activities. I booked a 60 min. Deep Tissue Massage at the Hazelton Spa and it was the best massage I've had. My masseuse was able to get ALL of my knots out in the span of 60 mins (and I had many!). It was a very relaxing experience. The staff is super friendly and I can't wait to be back!

reviews.title: Best facial
text: Visited the spa two weeks ago for a facial. Gordana was my esthetician and she is amazing! She was incredibly thorough and cleaned every pore, yet was so gentle that the extractions didn't hurt at all. I felt so pampered and the experience was at least as relaxing as a massage. I really liked the Valmont products and I've been getting tons of compliments on my skin.

reviews.title: Great spa
text: My friend sent me to the Hazelton spa before my wedding and it was the perfect retreat. Very private, I had the place mostly to myself, totally zen atmosphere, nice pool. Staff were polite and helpful and made me feel welcome, especially Vanessa at reception - I felt like I was being given the star treatment! The manicure bar was also very private and cozy. This spa is a total hidden gem in Toronto and I would love to go back. I did not stay at the hotel but from what I saw it looks very luxurious as well.

reviews.title: Setting the bar VERY high
text: The facials at The Hazleton are some of my favourites (& I'm a bit of connoisseur) The customer service and quality of treatment make this luxury service well worth the investment. Special thanks to Hani Roustom for always making every Hazleton experience a beautiful one and to Jessica Li for her incredible guest service.

reviews.title: Extremely Relaxing
text: Went to the Spa at the Hazelton to celebrate my son's birthday. We were greeted by a very service oriented receptionist named Jessica who made checking in very easy. Both my son and I had what we feel are top notch massages. Our Registered Massage Therapists were named Peggy and Rosalia - both extremely personable and attentive to our needs. I have had massages in many different places... This massage was one of the best I have had. Afterwards we spent some time in the steam rooms and also went to the pool. The facilities were exceptionally clean and the amenities plenty.

reviews.title: Great Experience!!!
text: From start to finish, The Hazelton Spa was absolutely wonderful.

I booked two 60 minute Swedish massages through their info email, and had the pleasure of booking through Brenda. Brenda was professional, but more importantly, exceptionally kind through the entire process. When we arrived, Brenda wasn't at the desk but shortly after, I met her in person and she introduced herself (as we had been emailing back and forth a bit). She made sure that we were comfortable through our time there. She's definitely an asset to the team!
The receptionist (I missed her name!) at their front desk walked me through the spa, explaining what was available to us during our time there, and offering any assistance as needed.
Onto the massage - Teale was so great! She went through any problems areas, level of pressure I wanted, and then went to work. I don't think I've ever been more relaxed!

From start to finish, The Hazelton Spa provided impeccable service. Their staff made the experience great, added to the fact that their facilities are beautiful (clean dressing room, beautiful waterfall showers, eucalyptus steam rooms, gym facilities and a beautiful pool).
I would recommend The Hazelton Spa to anyone from the area, or visiting!

reviews.title: Most cleanly maintained spa in Toronto
text: The Valmont facial is nice if you enjoy to be well-massaged. The place is small and the photos are not as good-looking as the others (Four Season, Ritz, Shangri-la, Trump...), however this is the only place in Toronto you can enjoy a true luxury standard spa. The Four Season and Ritz are crowded with selfie-taking "tourists" if you know what I mean. And they are not that clean and well-serviced. Trump is the worst: it's a Chinatown-foot massage-shop feel.
The Valmont spa really appreciates repeat customers, they will go out of their ways to accommodate last-minute appointments, take-home samples, ... Anything to make you ladies happy.

reviews.title: Hazelton Spa!!
text: The ladies at the Spa deserve all the praise! It was my first time going in for any type of treatment. When I arrived, Rosalia was ready to greet me and make me feel comfortable, she already knew my name before I even introduced myself, got me settled in and I felt so welcomed! I work at a hotel myself and our agents could really learn from this hotel, the service was phenomenal! Rosalia is wonderful and a great RMT! Vanessa was the receptionist that day and she too was amazing; encouraging me to use the other facilities and helping me feel pampered on my day off. I apologize for the late review ladies!

reviews.title: Spa visit
text: Went here at my wifes insistence.  I hate being on display so loved it's privacy.  Vanessa and Brenda were especially helpful and made me feel at ease.  Rosalia, my therapist was beyond amazing but mostly.... I LOVED the steam!  Worth coming for just the steam and the Hazelton blend tea!!!!!

reviews.title: Disappointing Spa Day!
text: My husband & I visited this spa for Valentine's Day last year. It was quite expensive but decided to splurge for the occasion. We were very disappointed. First off we had to walk around the hotel, taking the elevator etc in our robes standing beside people who were checking in to the hotel which was quite awkward and not very relaxing at all. The couples massage took place in a hotel room. The therapists didn't even leave the room for us to change and get on the tables and instead stayed in the room in the "bathroom area" which again was quite uncomfortable. Not to mention the massage itself was nothing special. The change rooms were nice and many toiletries were provided but neither of us were impressed. We are spa enthusiasts and go quite often to various spas all over the GTA and this was probably one of our least enjoyable experiences. Definitely not going back!

reviews.title: Amazing service!
text: I stayed here in June 2019, the spa receptionists Sadia and Sherina were so kind and helpful! Great service!

reviews.title: Amassing experience
text: The massage experience was absolutely heaven. Amassing facial massage and deep tissue.The therapist is attentive to your needs. I enjoyed steam room & pool with salt water.  Beautiful facilities & excellent staff. One of the best massages I have had.

reviews.title: I usually find it difficult to go on a busman’s holiday. Not so at the Hazelton.
text: (posted for my spouse)
As the owner of a  boutique medical spa, I know how hard it can be to find great staff.

One of the amazing qualities  of the Hazelton Spa is the exceptional staff. Jessica is a spa manager par excellence,  head and shoulders above any I have  met at other five star hotel spas. And Laura and Kim always make me feel welcome and pampered. The team is consistent, appropriate, kind, warm, and always professional. Even for those living in Toronto, each visit to the Hazelton Spa is a holiday. Thank you!

reviews.title: Facial at the spa
text: First time at the spa at the Hazelton and was very impressed. The staff are very professional and the facial with Marie Nguyen was excellent! I will definitely visit again.

reviews.title: Special Treat, Wonderful Service
text: This isn't the first time coming to this spa but nor do I visit on a regular basis - even though I would like to. The services are high quality as are the staff and estheticians. It's small and private, quiet and relaxing. Facials with Marie Nguyen are lovely and massages by Chrystal, a registered therapist, are therapeutic and a great escape from the day to day. I enjoy the pool and steam room while I'm there as well. Highly recommended - they also call you back within a reasonable amount of time after leaving a message.

reviews.title: Amazing spa day for surprise bridal shower group!
text: Jessica, the Spa Manager at Hazelton Hotel was extremely helpful and professional! I decided to surprise my sister with a spa day for her and her 9 friends while living abroad (trying to manage 9 people by email is quite difficult in itself!) Jessica made the whole booking process seamless and was extremely organized and efficient. She got back to me right away on the countless emails we had back and forth. I felt really comfortable knowing that my sister and her friends would be taken care of! Surprise went off without a hitch and everyone had a great time and loved their treatments (hot stone massages, Swedish massage, facials and mani/pedi) and the use of their swimming pool and steam room!  I would highly recommend this spa for a stress free relaxing day! Thanks again Jessica for helping make this day a special one!

reviews.title: Excellent Spa!
text: This was our second visit to the Hazelton Spa. Both times we had a great experience! Everything is first class. The Staff at the front desk escort you to the Spa. We had a very warm welcome at the Spa Desk where they welcomed us back. The facilities are very clean and modern. The therapists, Teal and Gordana were very professional and provided both of us a very relaxing and therapeutic massage. Highly recommend these two ladies and the Spa!

reviews.title: Best Spa Experince Everytime!
text: Everytime I visit the spa at the Hazelton my experience is amazing and perfect! I have been going there every month for waxing. When I call to make an appointment the front desk is so friendly and they make it easy. In particular, Brenda, who works at the front desk is so nice and accommodating to find a day and time that works best for me. My first time at the spa, she showed me around and answered all my questions about the wax that is used.

I have waxing done by Gordana everytime and each time it is a great experience. She is so nice and makes me feel so comfortable as well as she makes the waxing experience painless. I have sensitive skin, but she uses wax that does not irritate it at all. I love that the spa offers high quality hard wax that makes it less painful. I'm so thankful to have found Gordana as she always does a great job. She  always accommodates me, when I was only able to go to the spa for waxing on a particular day (and I desperately needed it done for vacation) which was her day off, she kindly came in to work that day just for me. That was so kind of her and I'm so grateful as I can tell that she loves her job and really cares about her clients. I am very picky about having my eyebrows done as I want a particular shape, but also want to also keep them looking full. Gordana does the best job on my eyebrows as she did the exact arched shape I wanted, but also kept them looking full. She is the queen of eyebrows! Gordana's kind spirit and positive energy makes it enjoyable for me every time. She is very detailed as she makes sure that she removes all the hair and wax as I never leave feeling sticky. She is the best and I recommend her to everyone!

The facility itself is always clean and looks great. The spa bed that I lay on for waxing is so comfortable and the room itself is nice and large. I recommended this spa to so many people as I have not had one bad experience. I recommend this spa not only for waxing, but it's a relaxing atomsphere for a massage, facial, mani/pedi. This spa is certainly perfection as I look forward to my spa experience there each time!

reviews.title: The Spa at The Hazelton
text: I began my New Year in relaxing fashion by booking myself a deep tissue massage at the Hazelton Spa.  From hassle free booking with Darlene, to my outstanding deep tissue treatment with Teale, it was the ideal way to commence my new year. The staff and the facility were also incredible, Brenda showed me around before I got settled in ensuring all of my questions and needs were taken care of.  I got to indulge in some lunch off their hotel menu too (I highly recommend the veal parmigiana). The Spa at The Hazelton was an all around fantastic experience and I will definitely be returning, cheers!

reviews.title: Great Spa Services
text: The day spa at this little boutique hotel is a hidden gem! I just started going there after the spa I used to go to closed down for renovations. I use their beauty services and Gordana is exceptional. Fabulous customer service from everyone I've interacted with. There is a pool, gym and locker room facilities available as well. The prices are also very reasonable. I highly recommend the Spa at Hazelton!

reviews.title: weekend of relaxation
text: Very happy with the Hazelton Spa! They have done an amazing job of keeping guests feeling safe and comfortable in the times we're in. The massages were PERFECT. We will be booking with them again, and cannot wait to do so.
Thank you to all the staff. Everyone is always so polite and will do as much as they can to make their guests feel "at home."
Counting down the days to when the whole vicinity is open :)

reviews.title: Birthday Relaxation
text: I decided to treat myself to a massage for my birthday as a way to relax after a couple stressful months at work. Given the pandemic I was a little hesitant to have personal services completed, however the precautions and measures put in place at The Hazelton Hotel and the Spa made me feel very safe. Everyone also acknowledged my birthday, which made me feel very special given the current times.

Beata was absolutely fantastic! She found knots that I didn’t even know existed. I had a lot of tension in my shoulders from working at a computer all day, and she managed to to work out all the points that were causing me pain. I left the spa feeling like a completely different person.
I will definitely be back and will recommend Beata and the Hazelton Spa to everyone!

reviews.title: Amazing birthday treat!
text: Treated myself to a Swedish massage on my birthday, and it was one if the best experiences ever. I was a bit hesitant to go to a Spa during the pandemic, but I certainly felt safe and taken care of.
Even though I arrived early, they were ready to accommodate me and I did not have to wait, they also wished me a great birthday which made me feel really special  :)
Crystal was really attentive and helped me with a few concerns that I had, she even taught me a few stretching exercises to help with my shoulder.
I had a great experience and I will definitely go back!

reviews.title: First but NOT last.
text: Had my first treatment at The Spa at The Hazelton and it wont be my last. From initial contact I was treat with amazing customer service. Knowledgeable, helpful, warm and friendly. The treatment itself was exceptional and my therapist really made every effort to keep me comfortable and ensure the treatment addressed my needs. The Spa follow-up was excellent and gracious. I already booked my next treatment.

reviews.title: Best massage ever!!!!
text: I love everything at the Hazelton Spa. The staff are so professional and provide excelente customer service.  Super recommend.
I am going back for sure!!!

reviews.title: An unforgettable experience!!
text: I spent the day at the Hazelton Spa for my birthday and it was an experience to remember! The staff was so friendly they welcomed us with Champaign and chocolate covered strawberries. Ray and Sieda were so accommodating and made sure all our needs were met. Ray especially went above and beyond and made me feel so special I couldn’t have asked for a better birthday celebration. I was very relaxed and comfortable from beginning to end. I will definitely return to this beautiful spa in the near future, I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Facial at Spa
text: What a great experience. Warmly welcomed by Sadia at the reception, and a fabulous one hour facial by Gordana. Gordana took a look at my skin and customized the treatment to fit. It was relaxing, quiet, great customer experience and would highly recommend! I look forward to going back for another facial before my wedding!

reviews.title: Great escape
text: After a stressful  day at work on a cold November day - this is the place to visit! It was just amazing to step aside from my hectic life to relax and be pampered. The staff was welcoming and professional . Massage therapist was attentive, caring and knowledgeable. The facility is luxurious and clean. Simply the best spa in the city. Will definitely be back.

reviews.title: Massage
text: I had a wonderful experience at the spa at the hazelton which I was referred to by Sadia. I took my husband for his birthday and we both had a swedish massage. It was extremely relaxing. Sherina took really good care of us and my husband received a cute surprise with birthday treats planned by Sadia. Raymond does an excellent job of maintaining the spa.

reviews.title: My spa of choice in Toronto
text: I've been going to the Hazelton Hotel Spa for many services for a few years. I followed my esthetician Gordana there when the spa she was working in closed for 2 years of renovations. The Hazelton Hotel Spa is the perfect size, not too big- it's very clean, comfortable, quiet and the staff is fabulous, professional and discreet. The hotel itself is a beautiful five star property and many high profile people stay there. A special shout out to my favourite receptionist at the spa- Kimberley. I've been to several other high end spas in Toronto over the years and while they are also beautiful and very good, I found them to be to big and the service is not as personal.
